编制说明：
银行家问卷调查是中国人民银行2004年建立的一项季度调查。调查采用全面调查与抽
样调查相结合的方式，对我国境内地市级以上的各类银行机构采取全面调查，对农村信用
合作社采用分层PPS抽样调查，全国共调查各类银行机构3200家左右。调查对象为全国各
类银行机构（含外资商业银行机构）的总部负责人，及其一级分支机构、二级分支机构的
行长或主管信贷业务的副行长。

q
予各选项不同的权重 i（赋予“好/增长”选项权重为 1，赋予“一般/不变”选项权重为
c q

Preparation instructions:
The Bankers Questionnaire is a quarterly survey established by the People's Bank of China in 2004. The investigation adopts comprehensive survey and sampling
Through a combination of sample surveys, a comprehensive survey of various banking institutions at or above the prefectural and municipal levels in China was carried out, and rural credit
The cooperative uses a stratified PPS sampling survey, and a total of about 3,200 banking institutions of various types were surveyed across the country. The survey target is all over the country
Heads of headquarters of quasi-banking institutions (including foreign-funded commercial banking institutions) and their first-level branches and second-level branches
The president or the vice president in charge of credit operations.
